features.featureTitle: Update the visual theme across App.tsx, BillingForm.tsx, and BillSummary.tsx to match the ZWEETI Pro reference design: use grey background (#f2f2f2) for the page, white card container (420px wide, rounded corners, box-shadow), orange accent #ff5722 for headings, table header backgrounds, and primary buttons, dashed borders for table rows, and a centered layout.

Add a 'Download Bill' button styled in blue (#2196f3) with white text, placed alongside the existing Print Bill button in the actions area of App.tsx. Clicking it should generate and download a plain-text or HTML representation of the current bill (customer name, items, subtotal, GST, grand total) as a file named 'zweeti-bill.txt'. The Download Bill button must also be hidden during print.
